ud4.1:4.3: jaṅghāvihāraṃ → jaṅghavihāraṃ (pts1, mr), anuvicaramāno → anuvicaramāno addasā kho (bj, s1-3, pts1) | anuvicaramāno addasa (mr), manuññaṃ → idaṃ padaṃ videsapotthakesu natthi, ^an9.3#1 [3. Meghiyasutta]
ud4.1:7.2: ekakamhi → ekakamhā (bj, pts1) | ekakomhi (s1-3), tāva, yāva aññopi koci →  yāva añño koci (sī1)
ud4.1:25.2: Anugatā → anuggatā (bj, mr aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pāṭhantaraṃ), uppilāvā → ubbilāpā (si, s1-3, pts1)
